attributes.action: Force all retailers and brewerys to raise the minimum price of bottled alcoholic drinks to at least £3 and do away with alcohol promotions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The NHS and the Police Service are put under a great deal of strain through people who purposefully 'binge' drink.  The breweries, retailers, pubs and nightclubs, have to be held responsible for allowing this to happen. If the Government forced these companies to increase the price of bottled alcoholic drinks to a minimum of £3 and made alcohol promotions (BOGOF) illegal, then the NHS and the police service may be able to redirect there finances on more worth while causes.
